channel.title: Error, help please
channel.description:
Well yeah. i was adding some npcdrops and as soon as i add them, this happens when i try to run my server.
[code]Server is online. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "8 100 1 1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2037) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:547) at server.main(server.java:110) [/code]
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Error, help please
item.dc:creator: @1337_owns 1337 owns
item.description:
@1337_owns wrote:

Oh ok, ill see if it works.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 03, 2009, 03:50:54 pm[/size][hr]It worked, thanks.

use the tab button because if you use space the compiler will take it as an error
